title: Linear Project Management Integration Complete
description: Successfully integrated Stand Up Sydney project with Linear for comprehensive project management. Created 5 teams (Frontend, Backend, Testing, Infrastructure, Integration), 4 projects (Platform Overhaul, MCP Integration, Knowledge Graph, Production Systems), 14 labels, and imported 16 initial issues. Configured automations for Git integration, Knowledge Graph connectivity, multi-agent coordination, and N8N workflows. This provides unified tracking, automated routing, real-time updates, and proactive issue creation.

solution.description: Successfully activated Linear integration with working automation. Created BACKEND team and first critical issue 'BACKEND-1 - Fix Google Authentication System' at https://linear.app/sus-gigpig/issue/BACKEND-1/sus-fix-google-authentication-system. Knowledge Graph monitor is now operational and monitoring for new critical issues to auto-create Linear issues. Linear is now fully operational for automatic issue tracking and completion monitoring.
